feed.title: Benjamin Clementine
feed.subtitle: Official website for Victoires de la Musique, Mercury Prize Winning Poet and artist Benjamin Clementine.

entry.title: ‘Quintessence’ is out now
entry.content:
‘Quintessence’ is out now. Listen here

In order to make the new album available for all around the same time, ‘I Tell A Fly’ will now be released globally on September 29th (October 2nd in the US). Pre-order here

entry.title: Brussels Show Rescheduled
entry.content: The performance at Cirque Royal, Brussels on November 25th has now been moved to the Ancienne Belgique and rescheduled for November 8th, 2017. All tickets purchased remain valid, and for those who cannot attend the new date, please request your reimbursement before September 30th, 2017 from the point of purchase.
entry.summary: The performance at Cirque Royal, Brussels on November 25th has now been moved to the Ancienne Belgique and rescheduled for November 8th, 2017. All tickets purchased remain valid, and for those who cannot attend the new date, please request your reimbursement before September 30th, 2017 from the point of purchase.

entry.title: Benjamin To Feature on Nina Conti’s Edinburgh Festival BBC2

link.title: Benjamin To Feature on Nina Conti's Edinburgh Festival BBC2

entry.content: An interview and live footage will feature in Nina Conti’s Edinburgh Festival today at 7:30PM on BBC2.
entry.summary: An interview and live footage will feature in Nina Conti’s Edinburgh Festival today at 7:30PM on BBC2.
